data.title: America's Unions
data.meta_description: The AFL-CIO is an expression of the hopes and aspirations of the working people of America. We resolve to fulfill the yearning of the human spirit for liberty, justice and community; to advance individual and associational freedom; to vanquish oppression, privation and cruelty in all their forms; and to join with all persons, of whatever nationality or faith, who cherish the cause of democracy and the call of solidarity, to grace the planet with these achievements.
data.text:
State of the Unions

The labor movement is a force to be reckoned with this Labor Day. We're shining a spotlight on the tremendous progress working people are making and will continue to make this election.

Watch Now

Stay Up-to-Date With The AFL-CIO

Get Email Updates

How to Form a Union

Every worker deserves the right to bargain over their salary and working conditions. Union members earn better wages and benefits than workers who arenâ€™t in unions.

The Toll of Neglect

Read the Report

The 2023 edition of the Death on the Job: The Toll of Neglect report shows how too many workers remain at serious risk of workplace injury, illness and death.

What Unions Do

Did You Know

According to an October 2023 survey, 41% of Amazon workers have been injured on the job.

AFL-CIO Now
